head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CANNISTRACI, DR. ANDREW J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CANNISTRACI, DR. ANDREW J.

block.p: CANNISTRACI-Dr. Andrew J. Noted dentist, author, and lecturer died on June 12, 1998 following a stroke. Beloved father of Camille Cannistraci and Laura Carthy. Loving grandfather of Theresa and Terrence. Dear brother of Maria DeFrancisci and brother-inlaw of Ignatius DeFrancisci and Rose Merritt. Devoted friend of Phyllis Seidenfrau. Survived by six fond nieces and nephews. Reposing at Farenga Bros. Funeral Home, 920 Allerton Ave., Bronx until Monday, 10:15 AM. Mass of Christian Burial at St. Clare's Church at 11:15 AM.
